articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Another Hindu temple 'attacked' with pro-Khalistan graffiti in California - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Hindu American Foundation said it was in touch with temple leaders and contact with the Alameda Police Department and Civil Rights Division. | Latest News India
articles.content: A Hindu temple in the US state of California was allegedly defaced with pro-Khalistan graffiti, the Hindu American Foundation (HAF) said on Friday. The incident took place weeks after the Swaminaraya… [+2305 chars]
